articles.title: Today, I saw firsthand how Dragon Copilot will help physicians across the NHS spend more time on patient care and less on paperwork. The work at Manchester University NHS Foundation Trust is a powerful example of how tech can be used by clinicians to focus on what matters most.
articles.author: stclarke
